pages.text: Belonostomus 'sp.1' is a cretaceous species of Belonostomus from the sediments of Lebanon, particularly recognizable by the ridiculously long rostrum that would extend sometimes to be as long as the whole rest of the body; although the remains of this species were described, no official binomial naming was assigned to it, thus the lack of species name.
